TopicTitle: Cannot (could not, anyway) reply to threads

Articles.Content:
That was very weird. For maybe the last 10 or 15 minutes, the reply box was seemingly broken for me, clicking it would do nothing. Nor would clicking the "Reply to Topic" button at the top of the thread. I also could not change account settings, nor edit existing posts.

If that was a forum bug, and not just a client-side error, it's pretty serious.
